column2: Loop Industries, Inc. focuses on depolymerizing waste polyethylene terephthalate (PET) plastics and polyester fibers into base building blocks. The company is headquartered in Terrebonne, Quebec and currently employs 34 full-time employees. Through its patented technology, the Company produces Polyethylene terephthalate (PET)/Polyester plastic from fossil fuels by depolymerizing waste PET plastic and polyester fiber (water bottles, soda bottles, consumer packaging, carpets, polyester textiles and industrial waste) into its base building blocks. The Companyâ€™s technology allows waste PET plastics to be upcycled into PET packaging for consumer goods companies. The company specifically targets PET/Polyester plastic allowing the removal of all impurities, such as colors/dyes, labels and all organic and inorganic waste.
